name: Media Preparation
description: Hydrate basal media, add nutrient supplements and buffer adjustments per SOP-PREP-001.
resource_notes: Requires stainless steel bioreactor BR-500 cleaned and verified.
Verify raw material lot traceability before dispensing.

name: Instrumentation Calibration
description: Calibrate and verify sensors prior to charge. QA sign-off required before proceeding.
resource_notes: Calibration performed with DO and pH sensor kits.
Record calibration curves in LIMS.

name: CIP and SIP
description: Execute cleaning in place and steam in place cycles per CIP/SIP recipes.
resource_notes: Cycle must reach validated temperature profiles.
QA release required before introduction of media.

name: Charge & Inoculate
description: Charge sterile media and inoculate culture with validated seed lot.
resource_notes: Ensure inoculum viability >95%.
Maintain aseptic technique throughout charge.

name: Culture Monitor
description: Monitor culture for critical parameters, adjust feeds and maintain setpoints.
resource_notes: Record hourly DO, pH, temperature in MES log.
Trigger hold state if DO drops below 30%.

name: Harvest & Clarify
description: Clarify broth and transfer to chromatography feed tank.
resource_notes: Set centrifuge to validated speed profile.
Perform bioburden sample post-clarification.

name: Chromatography Capture
description: Load clarified feed to chromatography column following ACTA recipe.
resource_notes: Capture yield target: >88%.
Record conductivity and UV traces.

name: CIP Flush
description: Perform final CIP flush to return vessel to standby state.
resource_notes: Neutralize effluent per EH&S requirements.
Complete equipment logbook entries.

name: QA Release Review
description: QA reviews batch records, deviations, and quality test results for release.
resource_notes: All critical deviations must be dispositioned.
Release decision logged in QMS.

name: Requirements Definition
description: Capture URS, process requirements, and create initial concept package.
resource_notes: Collaborate with process SMEs for clarification.
Publish concept P&ID and scope statement.

name: Mechanical Design
description: Generate 3D CAD, nozzle schedules, and fabrication drawings.
resource_notes: Verify ASME BPE compliance for hygienic surfaces.
Review design with stress analysis and maintain revision control.

name: Automation Architecture
description: Define PLC/SCADA architecture, I/O list, and control narratives.
resource_notes: Specify sensor models and calibration requirements.
Update electrical schematics and network topology.

name: Strategic Procurement
description: Issue RFQs, evaluate vendors, and release purchase orders for long-lead items.
resource_notes: Capture supplier certifications and lead times.
Align deliveries with fabrication milestones.

name: Vessel Fabrication
description: Cut, roll, weld, and polish vessel shell and heads.
resource_notes: Perform hydrostatic test post-weld.
Document weld maps and inspection reports.

name: Mechanical Assembly
description: Install agitator, jackets, ports, and utility manifolds on skid.
resource_notes: Torque critical fasteners per spec.
Verify alignment of rotating assemblies.

name: Controls Integration
description: Wire control panel, load PLC code, and perform I/O checkout.
resource_notes: Document firmware versions and logic revisions.
Complete loop checks with simulation bench.

name: Factory Acceptance Testing
description: Execute FAT protocol including pressure test, CIP/SIP simulation, and control verification.
resource_notes: Capture deviations and corrective actions.
Compile calibration and traceability dossier.

name: Crating & Logistics
description: Prepare unit for shipment with protective wrapping and custom crating.
resource_notes: Purge with nitrogen where required.
Include manuals, FAT report, and spare kit.
